name: Soultia
summary: "Soultia" is a one-person independent sandbox built battle game. With the traditional box sandbox features, it also has a very rich and powerful combat and equipment system.The game has 23 monsters and 3 BOSS, 36 weapons, 10 hairstyles, 18 sets of equipment, dozens of accessories and mounts.Each hair style, equipment has 5 colors, you are free to choose what color you want to dye yourself.Weapons can recast dozens of affixes and can be upgraded to +9 quality. When playing the blame, it may be easier to try to cast different affixes or upgrade weapons.In addition, the game also has a unique casting sword system , each monster and old monster have a unique soul, each soul has a weapon attribute and soul skills.After you get Soul Crystal, you can cast soul crystals, souls, ores into weapons on the weapon casting table. By adding different souls, your weapons can have unique attributes and create unique weapons that belong to you only!There are also 2 kinds of game consoles in the game. After being placed, you can play mini games in the game. A "stupid bird fly", a "space warplane", the points can be directly converted into gold coins in the game, let you If you don’t leave home, you can also get rich.
